author: CBS News
title: South Africa imposes stirct lockdown orders during coronavirus outbreak
description: South Africa, the hardest hit country in Africa, has enacted some of the strictest lockdown regulations in the world. Security forces are even firing rubber bullets at people who don’t follow the stay-at-home order. Debora Patta reports.
